title: Key-Value Store
description: Implement a simple key-value store that simulates local data persistence with typed getters.
instructions: Create a KeyValueStore class with put(key, value) and getString/getInt methods. Demonstrate storing and retrieving different types.

hints.text: Use MutableMap<String, Any> as the internal store
Use 'as? Type' for safe casting in typed getters
Provide default values when key is missing

commonMistakes.correction: Use safe cast (as?) and provide a default value
Always provide a default value parameter
Store as Any and cast on retrieval
